name: Justin Time
description:
You're Private Justin Time. A military time research facility has gone dark. No communications for days. You've been sent to investigate.

Now you're stuck in an endless time loop.

You need to fix the time machine, but you don't have much time before the loop resets! Fight past enemies from the past and the future in a groundhog's day from hell.

Controls:

  • WASD/ARROW KEYS: Move
  • SPACEBAR: Shoot/Select
  • BACKSPACE/ESC: Exit
  • E: Interact

Credits:

  • Pandepic and pleb2 - Programming
  • Apos - Visual Effects/Graphics Programming
  • Tyler Miles (ohCurtains) - Art/Animations
  • Mike Bibby (SadMonsterParty) - Music/Sound Effects

Source code: https://github.com/pandepic/LudumDare47
